title: Jenson from Updikes book
content:
Hi everybody out there!

May I ask someone a favour?  
I am looking for a scan or something of the page in Daniel Berkeley Updikes “Printing Types, their History, Forms and Use” that showes Nicolas Jensons type. It’s in the first volume. Could be a rough one, I need it for a quick comparison.

Thanks a lot!

Stefan

 [‹ Type-Pet Peeves](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160850/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36625 "Go to previous forum topic") [Where do I find free nuggets ? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906160850/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36483 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Stefan Seifert

comments.content:
Thank you very much, Bob!!

You are so nice.

What a page, isn’t it?  
Pure harmony.

Thanks a lot  
Stefan
